alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 12:38PM CDT until September 23 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cass County in west central Missouri... Northwestern Henry County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1238 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Lynne, or near Harrisonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisonville, Peculiar, Holden, Garden City, East Lynne, Kingsville, Gunn City, La Tour and Quick City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
